title: HistoriCity: India’s ancient bedrock ‘Aravallis’ at risk amid ecological battles
description: Public outrage over the Supreme Court's hill definition in the Aravalli range highlights its geological, cultural, and historical significance to India.

title: Find out more about Worcester's ancient monastery and grand guest hall
description: WORCESTER and its rich history is very well recorded in numerous archives across the county. A valuable journal covers many topics, including a description of several Christmas feasts held at Guesten Hall, part of the monastery that is now a ruin.

description: Anglican Deacon Michael Van Dusen typically has plans for the Christmas season that do not involve a Toronto courthouse.
